sentences.sentence: It makes mini and compact track excavators (backhoes), rubber track skid steer loaders.
sentences.translation: 公司制造微型、小型牵引挖掘机、橡胶履带防滑装载机。

sentences.sentence: Another photograph online showed what some thought were the same backhoes burying parts of the train.
sentences.translation: 网上还有其他照片显示有同样的挖掘机将部分列车进行了掩埋。

sentences.sentence: Many were outraged over video that was posted online Sunday showing backhoes breaking apart carriages that had fallen off the elevated tracks.
sentences.translation: 许多人对周日网上流传的一则视频感到震惊，视频中，一辆挖土机将从高架桥上坠落的车厢拆解。
